text: Kꞌa te riꞌ xuchapleꞌj uyaꞌik kꞌutuꞌn, xubꞌij: Ri uKꞌojol ri Achi kuriq na kꞌax, ketzelax na uwach kumal ri kꞌamal taq kibꞌe ri winaq, kumal ri kinimaꞌqil ri e chꞌawenelabꞌ cho ri Dios xuqujeꞌ ri aꞌjtijabꞌ rech ri taqanik. Sibꞌalaj choqꞌaqꞌ kꞌu wi kakamisax na, xuqujeꞌ kakꞌastaj na uwach churox qꞌij.
